item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 1, 2024 at 2:55 AM UTC
item.description:

3. Physical Intelligence's first generalist robotic model (152 points | 60 comments)

26. The unreleased Commodore HHC-4's identity (35 points | 3 comments)
27. Feds: Critical Software Must Drop C/C++ by 2026 or Face Risk (13 points | 9 comments)

29. VMware Workstation Shifting from Proprietary Code to Using Upstream KVM (20 points | 19 comments)
